LanguageData.CNNetworkedArm.label: Networked Arm
LanguageData.CNNetworkedArm.description: A networked prosthetic that offloads processing to remote processors. Cheaper than self contained bionic arms, and more efficient, but requires infrastructure to function.
LanguageData.CNNetworkedHand.label: networked hand
LanguageData.CNNetworkedHand.description: A networked prosthetic that offloads processing to remote processors. Cheaper than self contained bionic hands, and more efficient, but requires infrastructure to function.
LanguageData.CNNetworkedLeg.label: Networked Leg
LanguageData.CNNetworkedLeg.description: A networked prosthetic that offloads processing to remote processors. Cheaper than self contained bionic legs, and more efficient, but requires infrastructure to function.
